question: Kalpana Dutt was associated with:
explanation: Kalpana Dutt was just 18 years old, when she led the Chittagong Armoury Raid. She was imprisoned for life but her sentence was commuted when Rabindranath Tagore and Mahatma Gandhi interfered. Kalpana Dutt and Preeti Lata waddedar were associated with chittagong armoury raid in 1930, under the leadership of Surya Sen.
